subject: Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Anna Fenninger snatched away the super-G gold medal at the world championships, but Vonn was not disheartened for long, recalling that she had injured her knee twice in the last two years.
snippet: Anna Fenninger snatched away the super-G gold medal at the world championships, but Vonn was not disheartened for long, recalling that she had injured her knee twice in the last two years.
